metadata.title: CVE-2021-23472 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: This affects versions before 1.19.1 of package bootstrap-table. A typeconfusion vulnerability can lead to a bypass of input sanitization when theinput provided to the escapeHTML function is an array (instead of a string)even if the escape attribute is set.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
